Class Layer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Layer

  • public class Layer
extends java.lang.Object
    The Layer class containg one layer of a jenga tower.
    Version:
    June 2014
    Author:
    Thomas Meijers, Jonas van Oenen, Nina lauger, Allessandra van Ree

      Block[] blocks
